name: Systems Restart
description:
PROCEDURE 0049325-ALPHA INITIATED. 
UNIT AR-L0 ACTIVATED.

USE ARROW KEYS TO MOVE.
USE THE [Z] KEY TO OPEN SAFES AND USE STATION WITH THE "S" SYMBOL.
POINT ONTO THE ENEMY TO ATTACK.
OPERATION: STARTED.

CONTACT REQUEST RECEIVED.
REQUEST GRANTED.


Arlo? Can you see what i'm typing?
Well I hope you can, and that no one else is able to.
So, a quick rundown for you of the procedure that you are to fulfill:
Get to the main computer, reset it, save the station.
You are our hope Arlo, remember.


Credits init success
